Simbad query to list nearest stars (with V magnitude < = 15):
  SELECT TOP 100 basic.OID, main_id, RA, DEC, plx_value, V
  FROM basic JOIN allfluxes ON oidref = oid
  WHERE (plx_value > 100) AND (V <= 15)
  ORDER BY plx_value DESC;
Columns:
  okay = 0 if part of visual binary system, 1 if good navigation candidate
  oid = Simbad object ID
  ra = right ascension (deg)
  dec = declination (deg)
  plx = parallax (mas) (reciprocal is distance in pc)
  vmag = V magnitude
  main_id = Simbad main_id
-----------------------
